title: From Those Wonderful Folks Who Gave You Pearl Harbor
description: From the back "I refuse to apologize for telling the truth about advertising, and if it offended some people, that's just too bad. If I had wanted to be loved by those people I would have joined the Peace Corps." Jerry Della Femina said that. He also "Advertising is the most fun you can have with your clothes on." And the critics agree!
author: Jerry Della Femina
